nodes.text: Tyne's Horky was a rough, rowdy, and lawless frontier mining town on a planet of the same name. The crime lord Kleb Zellock owned a piece of everything in town, and ran his criminal empire out of Doodnik's Café.

The town of Tyne's Horky first appeared in "The Lost Prince," a 1985 episode of the Star Wars Droids television series. The Lost Prince: A Droid Adventure, a children's book adaptation of the episode, identified Tyne's Horky as a frontier mining town. The StarWars.com Databank later applied that name and description to the town's planet, stating "Tyne's Horky is a small, uneventful mining planet on the frontier."
